mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, name, login_name, password, create_time, is_manager, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isManager,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update sys_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_manager = #{isManager,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, login_name, password, create_time, is_manager, is_deleted from sys_user
